original_title: UFC Fight Night 118: Cerrone vs. Till
overview: UFC Fight Night 118: Cerrone vs. Till was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship held on October 21, 2017 at Ergo Arena in Gda≈Ñsk, Poland. A welterweight bout between former UFC Lightweight Championship challenger Donald Cerrone and Darren Till was tabbed as the event headliner.
title: UFC Fight Night 118: Cerrone vs. Till
